ygData.subject: Re: Missed Notes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know the original reference for this, but the idea in general is that the army/cia have special black helicopters that make no sounds that fly
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Also, I'm in the US Army and have been playing EQ since April. Until today
> I have never seen/heard the term Black Helicopter used as a reference to
> anything, military or EQ related. What does this reference mean?

I don't know the original reference for this, but the idea in general is that
the army/cia have special "black helicopters" that make no sounds that fly
around at night spying on everyone. It's frequently cited by paranoids as part
of their persecution complex "CIA black helicopters... spying on me... listening
to everything I have to say".

To the general public, the phrase "black helicopters" is generally used to refer
to something that crazy people think exists, but don't really.

Of course, as a member of the US Army, I'm sure you know ALL about them, you're
just not allowed to mention them to us. :)

As for what happened to JM... I suspect the helicopters were involved there, too
:)

Jyzan
